import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Link,withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Header, Form, Button ,Input,Icon} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import {createProfile} from '../../action/profileAction'; const CreatePrfile = ({createProfile}) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location:'', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }); const [displaySocilaInputs,toggleSocialInputs] = useState({display:false}); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = FormData; const onChange = (e) =>{ setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log({formData}) } return (

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) =>({ isAuthenticated : state.auth.isAuthenticated }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,{createProfile})(CreatePrfile);
